CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 30, 1945, pg. 22, reads: "Dinner Party - Mrs. Edna Walker of Centre Avenue held a dinner party recently in honor of her nephew, Corp. Howard Harris, who is home on furlough, and her son, William Walker Jr., who will soon enter the service. Those present at the party were, seated left to right: Gladys Harris, William Walker Jr. and Clara Quarles. Standing: Jacqueline Maynard, Mrs. Thelma Jones, Thomas Walker, Mrs. Edna Walker, William Walker Sr., Marie Maynard, Corp. Howard Harris, and Mrs. Mazie Harris. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Gladys Harris, William Walker Jr., Clara Quarles, Jacqueline Maynard, Thelma Jones, Thomas Walker, Edna Walker, William Walker Sr., Marie Maynard, Corp. Howard Harris, and Mazie Harris gathered for party for Corp. Harris in Walker home, Centre Avenue, Hill District
